original_title: Bucky Beaver's Triple XXX Rated Stags, Loops, & Peeps!: Volume 39: Solo Gals!
overview: What’s this? Bucky goes arty! An overhead angle of a nicely built ’60s brunette, gigglingly hiking up her dress... Several camera angles later, she’s finding a new and interesting place to dangle her necklace!... Soon a stacked tousled-hair brunette with a cute kisser and knee stockings spreads sensually on a floral spread - wow! Is she an A+ or what?  Next a sexy long-haired honey blonde in pink hose does her, best to give herself rug burn... Later, a sweet young thing with long brown hair and a sensual mouth sits meditating on her mattress... Then another cute brunette gives herself a full-body massage. Keep those ’60s babes comin’!  Now it’s a frosted-blonde filly playing a five-finger exercise on her organ... Before a redheaded bookworm, dolled up for a date, spreads her l-o-o-o-o-n-n-g legs!... And a girl, with long straight dark hair removes a striped top to reveal black bra and lovely figure... While a cute redhead shows up nude and freckled on the floor...
title: Bucky Beaver's Triple XXX Rated Stags, Loops, & Peeps!: Volume 39: Solo Gals!
